name: UNRESTRAINED (itch)
description:
UNRESTRAINED

You control a huge purple beast that is trapped inside you for a long time!

Try to escape from the research facility that you've been kidnapped in. Unleash your inner monster, and kill everyone who stands in your way as you create a blood-bath behind you.

UNRESTRAINED is a fast-paced 2d top-down action game with fluid character controls, extraordinary powerful physical arms, and lots of bad guys to kill!

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

Left Mouse Click: Punch with left hand

Right Mouse Click: Punch with right hand

R: Restart level

Credits

Feyzi Ataberk Tiftik - SFX Design

Mehmet Alp Tamer - VFX Artist & Environment Design

Yiğit Doruk - Game Designer & Developer

Yiğit Ömer Kayhan - Artist & Level Designer

ImmortalRomanian - Composer
